title: Shrinking labor force shifts PPC inward

content.question: Which of the following would shift a country’s production possibilities curve inward?

choices.label: A reduction in the country’s inflation rate
A reduction in the country’s real interest rate
A reduction in the size of the country’s labor force
An increase in the typical retirement age in the country
An increase in the country’s cyclical unemployment rate

content.answer: A reduction in the size of the country’s labor force

topic.text: 1.2: Opportunity Cost and the Production Possibilities Curve (PPC)
